attributes.action: Repatriate the remains of british soldiers buried in war graves in muslim countries.
attributes.additional_details: Very soon the whole of the middle east will be dominated by the Taliban and if we do nothing - the preferred option for this government who absolutely HATE the truth of any matters - we will see the remains of honourable british war dead being desecrated on youtube.  Something has to be done NOW to repatriate the remains of british soldiers buried in muslim countries.
